languages.text: "Иокаста, так уж необходимо морить людей холодом?"
"Sauerback, was it really necessary to torture these people with cold?"

languages.text: "Sauerback, war es wirklich nötig, diese Leute mit Kälte zu foltern?"
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, was it really necessary to torture these people with cold?"

traits.locale_text: "Sauerback, war es wirklich nötig, diese Leute mit Kälte zu foltern?"

languages.text: « Sauerback, était-il vraiment nécessaire de torturer ces gens par le froid ? »
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, was it really necessary to torture these people with cold?"

traits.locale_text: « Sauerback, était-il vraiment nécessaire de torturer ces gens par le froid ? »

languages.text: «Sauerback, ¿de verdad era necesario torturar a esta gente con frío?».
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, was it really necessary to torture these people with cold?"

traits.locale_text: «Sauerback, ¿de verdad era necesario torturar a esta gente con frío?».

languages.text: 「ザウアーバック、あの連中を冷気で拷問するのは、本当に必要なことなのか？」
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, was it really necessary to torture these people with cold?"

traits.locale_text: 「ザウアーバック、あの連中を冷気で拷問するのは、本当に必要なことなのか？」

languages.text: “苏尔贝克，真的有必要让这些人忍饥挨饿、受尽折磨吗？”
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, was it really necessary to torture these people with cold?"

traits.locale_text: “苏尔贝克，真的有必要让这些人忍饥挨饿、受尽折磨吗？”

languages.text: "Sauerback, bu insanlara soğukla işkence etmeye gerçekten gerek var mıydı?"
languages.original_text: "Sauerback, was it really necessary to torture these people with cold?"
